description: This module aims to provide a practical experience in applying data analytics to real-world problems in todayâ€™s healthcare landscape. Students will (1) understand the current challenges in healthcare and how data analytics can be used to transform healthcare, (2) learn emerging analytics techniques and concepts that is commonly used in healthcare used cases, and (3) gain hands-on experiences in using data analytics to solve healthcare problems. The module covers concepts such as model interpretation, data drifts and techniques like graph database and Convolutional Network Visualisation. Students are expected to develop codes in the analytics software.
title: Healthcare Transformation with Analytics
